## ModelFormService.open() method

Opens the specified model form as a form sheet

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
open<TState extends {}, TForm extends {}>(config: ModelFormServiceConfig<TState, TForm, FormState<TState>>): MatBottomSheetRef<FormSheetWrapperComponent, ModelCommand>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [ModelFormServiceConfig](./model-form.modelformserviceconfig.md)<!-- -->&lt;TState, TForm, FormState&lt;TState&gt;&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

MatBottomSheetRef&lt;FormSheetWrapperComponent, ModelCommand&gt;

A reference to the bottom sheet with the model form.
